definitions.definition: a solid substance containing a lot of fat that becomes soft and melts when warm:
examples: She watched the wax as it dripped down the side of the candle.

definitions.definition: the soft, yellowish substance inside your ears
to put a thin layer of wax on the surface of something, either to make it waterproof or to improve its appearance:
examples: I've waxed the floor so it's rather slippery.

definitions.definition: to remove hair from someone's body by covering it in a thin layer of warm wax that is then pulled off:
